OOC: Okay backing it up.

BIC:

Megatron leaned over Astroblast. "Astroblast, just dodge the fire that will
come out of those guns. I willd deal with the force field, Motormaster".
Motormaster stepped forward with their device. It was the last atom
splitter they had, but it would do for this situation. He installed it into
Astroblasts laser cannon. It would allow him to open the shileds for long
enough.
